pr_title: Issue 4639: Table store helper to retry only on unknownhost and auth failure for update requests

timeline.message:
retry on unknownhost and auth failure

Signed-off-by: Shivesh Ranjan <shivesh.ranjan@gmail.com>

timeline.bodyText:
This change causes a slight change in the behavior of the controller wrt to createScope().
This change prevents retries in the case of `ConnectionDropped` or `ConnectionFailed`. In the case of `createScope()` 
workflow, this will prevent retries by the controller. And in this scenario the retries of the client would be used.
timeline.author: shrids

replies.bodyText:
Yes, that is correct. But its not necessarily a behaviour change (except the bug fix). Its just fail faster rather than retry.
Most updates happen from workflows.
Some happen in the context of client calls.
So we can wrap an additional retry loop on create scope if we want. we can take it as a separate issue. i have opened the following issue: #4657
replies.author: shiveshr
